channel.title: Predictions on Hockey By Numbers
channel.description: Recent content in Predictions on Hockey By Numbers

item.title: NHL Predictions - February 19, 2020
item.description: These predictions are created using an ELO Model. More information on my methodology is coming in a future post. Table 1: NHL Predictions - February 19, 2020 Game Probability Away Team Wins Probability Home Team Wins Florida Panthers @ Anaheim Ducks 57.3% 42.7% New York Rangers @ Chicago Blackhawks 49.7% 50.
